subsections.description: Turn on 3 AMP Generators and defend each one until it stays powered on. Each generator supplies power to part of the map.
After turning on power, dive into the water and resurface the Inclined Lift.
All around the map there are small piles of dirt and skulls that you can dig for rewards. Each player must first find a shovel around the map, then they can dig unlimited piles.

Each game, 10 loot crates will spawn underwater in 16 set locations. Each crate will give some loot when interacted, and a Random Perk power-up will spawn after all 10 are interacted. There are 4 possible spawns in the Bio Lab (2 near Melee Macchiato, and 1 in each water tunnel), 4 around Crab Island, 3 around the Shipwreck, 3 around Temple Island, and 2 around Castle Rock Island.

pic.alt: A loot crate with a shining green light

subsections.description: Loot Keys will occasionally drop from enemies and can be exchanged for loot.

pic.alt: Location to enter the Armory, near Stamin-Up

subsections.description: The radio is located by Stamin-Up, and the exfil location will be Temple Island (if open).

pic.alt: Stamin-Up - by spawn, through the door by the AMP Generator
Quick Revive - by spawn, down the stairs from the AMP Generator
Juggernog - at the top of the Inclined Lift
Elemental Pop - in the Sea Tower
Deadshot Daiquiri - on the way from Juggernog to Speed Cola
PhD Flopper - in the Mining Tunnels
Speed Cola - in the Sea Caves
Der Wunderfizz - on the Shipwreck at the bow (spawns at the start of round 25)

sections.description: Groups of fish spawn around the map and can be killed for loot. The fish can then be fried for extra rewards.

subsections.description: Fish can spawn all around the map, often seen in shallow water next to land where you can walk. Killing fish is easiest done using explosives or a Ray Gun, and some loot will drop for each killed fish. If 50 fish have been killed in the game, you will instantly be given all the perks.

There are 2 pans in the Mess Hall (between Deadshot Daiquiri and Juggernog) that can be used to fry fish. Interact on the oil next to the pans to pick it up, then interact on a pan to place the oil. For each fish killed in the game, it will be added to a hidden inventory (you do not need to interact on the dead fish). A fish can be added to a frying pan after the oil is added. On the next round, the fish can be eaten. If the fish sits for an additional round, it will burst into flames and damage you if you try to eat it.

pic.alt: Cooking Oil, to the right of the pans

subsections.description: After placing a fish in a pan, you may add 1 to 5 ingredients to temporarily upgrade the corresponding Ammo Mod upon eating the fish (this will unlock the Culinary Delight achievement). The upgraded Ammo Mods will trigger their effect every time. Interact on an ingredient to pick it up, then interact on the frying fish to add it. The ingredients always spawn in the same locations, and will respawn later in the game to be used again.

pic.alt: Beans (Napalm Burst) - in the Mess Hall, between some crates
Purple plant (Shadow Rift) - outside the Mess Hall, by some stairs leading towards Quick Revive
Snowball (Cryo Freeze) - upstairs in the building with Juggernog, on top of a fridge
Battery (Dead Wire) - in the room between Juggernog and Elemental Pop, just beneath the purple arrow
Brain (Brain Rot) - in Bio Lab, just through the entrance from the Speed Cola cave
Frying a fish with all 5 added ingredients

subsections.description: If Dr. Peck was bribed for the Beamsmasher calibrator code, you can give him a fried fish to refund the 5000 points. After frying a fish with no added ingredients, there will be a prompt to either 'take fried fish' or 'eat fried fish'. Take the fish and give it to Dr. Peck using the same box as the bribe money.

pic.alt: Giving fried fish to Dr. Peck

sections.description: Complete a quest from Captain Gregg to get some loot and a special Cursed Talisman item that permanently doubles points (with a cost). This will unlock the Treasure Hunter achievement.

subsections.description: Use Melee Macchiato in the Speed Cola cave to break some rocks.

Use the red X on the treasure map to find the location of the watch around Terminus Island. The spawn location is randomized each game, but will always be underwater. Pick up the watch and give it to Captain Gregg (the skeleton in the cave).

After Captain Gregg is done talking, there will be 3 new red X's on the map. Each red X marks a skeleton around the map, and the locations are the same every game. Bring Molotovs or Thermo Grenades to each location and throw one at the skeleton. This will spawn an H.V.T. that must be killed to collect a coin. After picking up the Cursed Coin, your screen will glow purple until you return the coin to Captain Gregg (you can wait and return all 3 at once or return each coin after retrieving it).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on the Shipwreck, at the base of the mast
Location 2 - on Temple Island, laying on some stone
Location 3 - on Castle Rock Island, by a lantern

subsections.description: Give the 3 coins to Captain Gregg to get some loot. The final step will now be available after 3 rounds.

3 rounds after the previous step, Crab Island will become stormy and continuously struck by lightning. The lightning will go away after some time, and will only return every 3-4 rounds until the treasure is found. While the island is storming, find and interact on the treasure chest to get a Cursed Talisman. With the Talisman equipped, kills will be worth twice as many points, but you will lose some points each time you get hit. You can return the Talisman back into the chest to remove the effect or give it to another player. A Dark Ops challenge can be unlocked for getting 25k points without taking any damage, while holding the Talisman.

pic.alt: Crab Island being struck by lightning
Treasure chest to interact during storm

subsections.description: Ride the Inclined Lift and use a weapon equipped with Dead Wire to shoot the Electrical Panels. After the final panel is shot, a door will open to the Research Lab.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in a room seen when riding the Inclined Lift and facing away from the PaP machine
Location 2 - on the wall seen when riding up on the Inclined Lift and facing left
Location 3 - on the wall at the top of the Inclined Lift
Location 4 - above the AMP Generator next to Juggernog
Location 5 - just outside the Juggernog room by a locked door

subsections.header: 2. Retrieve the EMF Fob from Dr. Tonovsky
subsections.description: Enter the Research Lab and kill the zombie stuck under the bookshelf. It will drop the part to pick up.

subsections.header: 3. Retrieve the Contents of Dr. Tonovsky's Briefcase
subsections.description: Next to Elemental Pop is a briefcase with a hand attached. Open the briefcase and pick up the part. A large group of Vermin will spawn after the briefcase is opened.

There are 3 laptops labelled 'X', 'Y', and 'Z'. All 3 must be powered on in any order, and each will show a randomized symbol to correspond with the labelled letter. The 3 letters and their matching symbols will be displayed on notes in the Research Lab after interacting with the laptops, so there is no need to memorize them.

pic.alt: Location 3 - between the caves and the Docks

subsections.description: Go back to the Research Lab and interact on the computer to return the Resonator. The computer can be interacted again to enter a code. Whiteboards in the back of the room can be used to solve the code depending on the symbols on the laptops. Alternatively, after entering any wrong code, Dr. Peck can be paid 5000 points to reveal the correct code.

pic.alt: Entering the code into the computer
Box to bribe for calibrator code

step.title: i. Pick up the Multiphasic Resonator
step.description: Wait for the Location Sequence to complete by ending the round, then the computer will highlight one of the islands. Take the Calibrated Resonator from the computer, then go to the selected island.

pic.alt: Selected island and Multiphasic Resonator to pick up

step.title: ii. Feed the AMP Orb
step.description: Interact on the AMP Orb to place the Multiphasic Resonator. Wait until it shocks a zombie, then kill the zombie so it drops an energy packet. Take the energy packet and bring it to the AMP Orb, and repeat until the AMP Orb flies away. This must be done twice more on different islands, and the AMP Orb will be a different color each time. Remember to pick up the Multiphasic Resonator each time before moving to the next island. After the final AMP Orb is fed enough energy, the AMP Munition will drop.

pic.alt: Blue AMP Orb on Castle Rock Island
Carrying the energy packet to the AMP Orb
AMP Orb flying to the next island, leaving the Multiphasic Resonator to pick up
Green AMP Orb on Crab Island
Purple AMP Orb on Temple Island

subsections.description: Build at the workbench in the Research Lab.
Go to Bio Lab and activate the trap by TODO. Fire the DRI-11 Beamsmasher at the tentacles until they drop the Hard Drive. Pick it up and give it to Dr. Peck.

pic.alt: Hard Drive dropping from shooting the tentacles with the Beamsmasher
Giving the Hard Drive to Dr. Peck

step.title: i. Find the code for Nathan's Chamber
step.description: A 3 digit passcode is required to unlock Nathan's Chamber, and it is randomized each game. Each number can be found on an object around the map, shown below.

step.title: ii. Enter the code
step.description: Go to Bio Lab and interact on the small window on the machine in the center of the lab. After the window is open, enter the 3 digit code on the keypad terminal below the window.

step.title: iii. Mini-Boss fight
step.description: Before continuing, make sure you have a strong weapon, plenty of ammo, etc. All players must interact on the Relief Valves simultaneously to unleash Nathan. This will lock all Bio Lab exits until Nathan is killed. Nathan is a stronger version of an Amalgam, and can regenerate health the same way normal Amalgams do. After Nathan is killed, a cutscene will play.

subsections.header: 3. Access the Computer in the Comms Room
subsections.description: Grab the Security Keycard underwater in Bio Lab, located TODO. Then bring it to the Comms room by TODO and interact with the computer TODO to access the network.

Pilot a Tactical Raft through the opening in the side of the Shipwreck, and climb the ladder to enter the secret Workshop. Interacting on a Node Connector will start a lockdown in the Workshop, so it is recommended to have all players in the room before interacting.

There are 3(TODO) possible locations for broken network connections around the map, but only 2(TODO) will need repairs. Take the Node Connectors from the Shipwreck Workshop to each broken connection, and interact to repair it.

pic.alt: Location 1 - on Crab Island near the Shipwreck
Location 3 - in the Speed Cola cave

subsections.description: Go back to spawn and get the Signal Hacking Device from Dr. Peck after some dialogue plays (TODO). Now go to the Sea and find the 3(TODO) buoys with satellites attached. Hold interact to hack the signal, then hack the remaining 2(TODO) buoys before the timer runs out. After the last buoy has been hacked, some dialogue will play, and it will begin a timed step. All players should go to the Bio Lab to be ready for the next step.

pic.alt: One of the Satellite Buoys to hack

subsections.header: 7. Defuse the Apocalypse Protocol Bombs in the Bio Lab
subsections.description: This step is timed, and will start automatically after the previous step is finished. There are 3 bombs in the Bio Lab that must be defused before the bomb detonation timer runs out, and failing to do so will end the game. Defusing a bomb requires holding interact for a long time, and you cannot use any weapons or equipment during this time. It is recommended to use Decoys(TODO) or Aether Shroud(TODO) in a solo(TODO) match.

You cannot leave the boss fight until it's done. Make sure you have perks, armor, strong weapons, and anything else you want to bring. Go to Bio Lab and interact on the keypad at the door by TODO to start the Final Encounter. After a brief cutscene, you must defeat Patient 13 by shooting its glowing parts. Be sure to avoid standing directly in front of Patient 13, as it has a strong melee attack that can down players. At 2 points during the boss fight, Patient 13 will hide underwater, and you must shoot its tentacles until it reappears. After Patient 13 vanishes for the second time, all players must stand near the lab and stay there until it reappears, as you may get trapped outside the arena and be killed when it reappears. For the rest of the fight, Patient 13 will block off the back half of the arena. TODO

pic.alt: Standing near the lab to avoid being trapped outside the map near the end of the fight

subsections.header: Can You Hear Me? Come In
subsections.description: Interact with 3 Mister Peeks headphones.

pic.alt: Location 1 - outside the door to Juggernog, on a cable drum
Location 2 - next to PhD Flopper, on a barrel
Location 3 - in Bio Lab, upstairs from the armor wall-buy and sitting on a cabinet

subsections.description: There are 3 small toy boats around the map, nearby the 3 islands. One of the boats at random will be blinking red, and can be interacted to start a boat racing minigame. The race can be repeated after 5 rounds when a different boat lights up, and once more 5 rounds after the second race.

pic.alt: Location 1 - at Crab Island, from the beach by the armor wall-buy and around the shore going to the right
Location 2 - at Temple Island, out a ways from the Sentinel Artifact fast travel symbol
Location 3 - at Castle Rock Island, behind the island not far from the shore

subsections.description: Go to Crab Island and throw an explosive at the crab trap on a cliff. There will now be 4 locations around the island where a group of crabs can be found. Melee one of the crabs on the ground to start a game of Whac-a-Crab. You will receive loot (or grenades) depending on your score, and the 4 locations each have different loot.

pic.alt: Perk can location - just below where the crab trap was shot
Salvage location - up the left hill from the Crafting Table
Essence location - in front of the armor wall-buy
Gun location - on the beach past the armor wall-buy

subsections.description: Collect all 6 stuffed animals, in any order, by interacting on them. Then, go to the Living Quarters (by Juggernog) and interact on one of the stuffed animals on the beds. Each stuffed animal will drop some loot, and they will all combine into the Mega-Stuffy. The Mega-Stuffy will last several rounds and can revive players.

pic.alt: Location 1 (Unicorn) - to the left of Stamin-Up, in a locker
Location 2 (Monkey) - at the start of the bridge going from Juggernog to Elemental Pop, on the right
Location 3 (Bear) - in Bio Lab, between the armor wall-buy and the Speed Cola cave
Location 4 (Elephant) - in the Mining Tunnels with PhD Flopper, under a barrier by the Gobblegum Machine
Location 5 (Giraffe) - on Crab Island next to a light, on the right side of the path when coming from the Crafting Table
Location 6 (Duck) - on the Shipwreck in a dumpster

subsections.description: Standing on the Gun Platform by the Void Cannon trap, use a weapon with Dead Wire to quickly shoot the 2 blinking blue sparks on 2 antenna towers (they can also be shot from other locations closer to the towers). The antennas will light up red for a short time after being shot successfully, but will both remain red if they are hit fast enough. Then, go to the next round and use the Void Cannon trap, and a satellite will be shot out of the sky (the trap does not have to kill any zombies). Go to Castle Rock Island to find the crash and loot.

pic.alt: Crash site on Castle Rock Island

subsections.description: In Bio Lab, there are some cages containing zombies up above the armor wall-buy, and another group of cages to the left of these. Kill all the zombies in all the cages, then wait a round. Now, kill all the Vermin that spawned in the cages, and do the same thing for the Manglers in the following round. After the Manglers are killed, a Random Perk power-up will be granted.

Jump into the water near Pack-a-Punch and destroy a specific rock with an explosive. This can be done easiest using a Frag or C4. All players can now pick up an oxygen tank to extend the time it takes to drown.

Each round, one of the small islands will have a few spores on it. For 3 rounds straight, shoot every single spore on the island (killing the Parasites is not required). On the 4th round, the spores will now be in the Speed Cola cave, and after destroying them all, you'll get some loot and a Random Perk power-up.

pic.alt: Spores in the Speed Cola cave on the 4th round

subsections.description: There is a basketball on the roof above Juggernog that can be shot at a specific angle to go into a hoop. If it makes a basket, it will drop some loot.
Buy the elevator from spawn to go to Bio Lab, then quickly start jumping until the elevator stutters. The elevator ride will then be spooky.

There are 2 fast travel locations around the map. Standing in the Void Cannon trap for long enough will teleport you to a random position around the map. The other method requires using the alt fire of the DRI-11 Beamsmasher on a symbol at Temple Island, which will teleport you to spawn.

pic.alt: Sentinel Artifact symbol on Temple Island

subsections.description: Shoot any pool ball to sink them all. 100 Essence will drop next to the pool table.

sections.description: There are 8 hidden power-ups around the map that can be shot or exploded to collect.

pic.alt: On the watchtower by spawn, in the window facing away from spawn
In Bio Lab, upstairs from the armor wall-buy and sitting on a cabinet (some boxes will be partially covering the power-up and can be shot away)
On Temple Island, up on a stone wall of the temple
Through a barrier by Quick Revive, inside a pail
On another Sea Tower, seen from the Sea Tower with Elemental Pop
On the Shipwreck, in the top right window
On Crab Island, in a barrier near the armor wall-buy

subsections.description: Spawns after all 7 other hidden power-ups have been collected.

pic.alt: Between spawn and Stamin-Up, on a barrel through a barrier
